There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around July 8th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsapprox 3:15pm while filling up my vehicle with gas, i looked to the north\north east and noticed 3 objects in the sky flying in a west\ south west direction. at first i thought they might be remote control airplanes or other small craft. but as i continued to observe, i noticed that they kept a tight formation. they changed direction a couple of times and they seemed to keep the same brightness no matter which direction they flied. i tried to capture in my cellphone video camera and pictures but nothing appears in the pictures and the video camera failed to record. as i contiued to observe (thinking my camera was recording) i watch as the three bright orbs followed each other making quick manuevers under a cloud formation. from my viewing distance they did look like seperate orbs but they flew in unison as one doing circles. they then flew into the cloud and disappeared. i tried to debunk and rationalize what i was seeing but realized i was seeing what i've been watching the skies for years for. i've attached 2 photos, maybe someone with better equipment may be able to see the 3 orbs.
Summary: 3 Orbs flying above Orange Park Acres Area
